title: Rust ppc64 requires AltiVec, which is not available on PowerPC e5500

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
rustc -Vv
rustc 1.35.0-nightly (88f755f8a 2019-03-07)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 88f755f8a84df1d9e6b17cf10c96ae8b93481b2e
commit-date: 2019-03-07
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.35.0-nightly
